alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:27AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clarke and Lauderdale Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meridian, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion around 230 AM CDT. Zero around 240 AM CDT. Causeyville around 250 AM CDT. Alamucha around 255 AM CDT. Snell around 300 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for east central Mississippi.
